content:
# I have successfully extracted 5 stone bricks from the furnace, bringing my inventory to:
# - 5 stone bricks
# - 12 wood
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone

# However, the furnace is now reporting "no ingredients to smelt" and has only 1 stone left. This indicates that I need to gather more stone to continue production.

# Next, I will gather more stone from the nearest resource location to ensure the furnace can keep smelting and producing stone bricks.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Locate the nearest stone resource again
move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone resource position
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Collect more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone.
